FuncDef: The test stop command stops the on-demand TWAMP Light measurement function.

ParaDef.Info:
Stops the on-demand measurement function for all test sessions.
-

Stops the on-demand measurement function for a test session with a specific ID.
For the X3 device, the value is an integer ranging from 1 to 3072.For the X8/X16 device, the value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8192.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To stop the on-demand measurement function for all test sessions or a specific test session, run the test stop command.
